projects.title: GoodBite
projects.category: SMS application which allows users to get directions to the nearest restaurants near them serving the cuisine of their choice, without an internet connection.

projects.title: Project Factory
projects.category: A Dockerized web application to share side projects and find collaborators, built using TypeScript, MongoDB, Express, React, Node, Firebase, and AWS.

projects.title: Ridesharing REST API
projects.category: A REST API for an Uber-like ride sharing application which utilizes microservices supported by MongoDB, Neo4j, and PostgreSQL.
